headline: Have $1,000? 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Now and Hold Forever.
summary: Tariffs might not impact Amazon as negatively as investors fear -- and either way, the company has huge long-term opportunities.  Coca-Cola may not be very exciting for growth investors, but it's a dependable business that should continue paying solid dividends.  At Berkshire Hathaway's latest shareholder meeting, CEO Warren Buffett announced that he would be stepping down from his position as the company's leader at the end of this year.
